attributes.action: Authorise open book examinations for GCSE English Literature 2017
attributes.additional_details: The introduction of closed book examinations, for GCSE English Literature, requires students to learn and memorize quotes for this exam.There are 2 literature papers which include the content of 15 poems,2 plays, and 1 novella.Exams shouldn't be a test on the student's memory,but how we interpret texts
attributes.background: requires students to learn and memorize quotes for this exam.There are 2 literature papers which include the content of 15 poems,2 plays, and 1 novella. Exams shouldn't be a test of the student's memory, but how we interpret texts
